# About Me

```{=html}
  <div class="cv-card cv-about">
  <p class="cv-lead">
    I‚Äôm a UCLA graduate student in <strong>Biostatistics</strong>, working at the intersection of 
    <strong>computational biology</strong> and <strong>statistics</strong>. 
    My <a href="research.qmd" class="link-primary fw-semibold">research</a> explores 
    <em>gene expression across epigenomic, transcriptomic, and proteomic layers</em> 
    to identify biomarkers, explain biological mechanisms, and build predictive models 
    for <strong>aging</strong>, <strong>flu vaccines</strong>, and <strong>immune-related diseases</strong>.
  </p>
  
  <p>
    I‚Äôm passionate about applying advanced 
    <strong>mathematical</strong> and <strong>statistical methods</strong> 
    to genetic analysis, with the goal of pushing forward the boundaries of 
    <strong>genetic research</strong> and contributing to 
    <strong>precision medicine</strong> and <strong>vaccine development</strong>.
  </p>

  <p class="cv-muted-note">
    Outside work I love hiking, music hunting, and I‚Äôve recently fallen into the tiki rabbit hole üçπ.
  </p>
</div>
```
